Package edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ActionInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Action, AttackAction, BreedAction, BuyItemsAction, DinosaurAction, DinosaurAttackAction, DoNothingAction, DropItemAction, EatAction, EatManyAction, FeedDinosaurAction, KickAction, MoveActorAction, PickFruitAction, PickUpItemAction, SpitBehaviour, WindowSmashAction
public interface ActionInterface
This interface provides the ability to add methods to Action, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
